column2: Leesie74, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: This is the only migraine med that has ever worked for me.  Side effects for me are not listed on the pamphlet.  I - like others here - get sensitivity to heat/cold (esp when washing my hands), feeling cold and/or having a cold nose,  and when I first eat/drink after taking it my jaws ache (like when you get that ache from eating a sour candy). Zomig always stops my migraine, so the side effects are well worth it!

column2: Mary, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: Been taking this medication for years & love it.  I too have a few side effects.  My joints seem to ache after taking it.  Although not enjoyable I will take that over the migraine.

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: After trying many other migraine medications I finally found "THE ONE"!  Side effects for me are so minor not worth mentioning.  Bye-bye migraines!

column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
pickle, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: It is the only medication to work for me but it gives me side effects such as drowsiness, sensitivity to heat and tender scalp but they are worth not having the excrutiating pain of a migraine

column2: AldenF, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: Excellent medication for me, ALWAYS effective.  Interesting side-effct, though: finger-tips and toes become very sensitive to hot water for several hours!

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I am a very busy mom and daycare provider.  I can take this medication at the start of a migraine and am able to continue to work without having to medicate, then lay down in a quiet room to get relief.  It's that quick and that effective.

column2: Jo Ann, 55-64 on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I've been taking Zomig for about 7years for chronic migraines. The only side-effects that I experienced was a weight on my chest sometimes and and a slight dizziness. My insurance rates went up because of this med(this stuff is very expensive).  So I've tried Cafergot and have had good success.  It's much cheaper too.

column2: Benny, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I cannot function without this drug. I take it every 18 hours to keep migraines away.

column2: HerEntrprs, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: Outstanding drug!  I have suffered with migraines since I was 8, I'm now 56. Started taking 6 yrs. ago.  Would not trade it for anything.  Only side effect I get is a little sleepy.  So I just sit down and take a 15 min. nap and I am fine.  It not only relieves the migraine completely, but it also helps to eliminate the neck and shoulder pain I suffer from due to a work injury. No pain of anykind for at least 24 hrs. I only take 2.5 mgs, not the 5.  MIRACLE DRUG, I LOVE IT!!!

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
rich, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: this drug really helps with a Migraine head    ache i have no know side affects

column2: Onyx2005, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I am a veteran of the recent conflict in Iraq and about 4 years ago I had a fall off of the flatbed of a truck. Ever since then I have been having terrible migraine headaches that last 2 to 3 days. So terrible that I would get violently ill and would eventually have to go to the emergency room. After 4 years and 2 doctors, I have found that this drug is truly a "miracle drug". I noticed that about fifteen to thirty minutes after taking it that my migraine was gone! I really mean gone, although I experienced 2 side effects, tightening of the throat and wide-spread body aches. They only lasted about 2 1/2 to 3 hours. I feel I would rather deal with those 2 side effects than deal with just the pain of a migraine, not to mention everything else that goes along with it. The pros do out weigh the cons in my case. I would tell anyone that deals with migraines often to at least look into it.

column2: pac2513@aol.com, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: This drug is a miracle!  I have been suffering from migraines for 10+ years and with this drug I get rid of my headache within 30-60 minutes of taking this pill.  The only problem I have is my prescription only allows 9 pills in one month and I usually run out before the end of the month.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I get migrianes every few weeks and they last 2-5 days at a time.  I was taking 3-4 excederin migraine pills at a time, to get my migraine down to just a headache.  Zomig is the only drug I have been able to take to completely get rid of a migraine, right away.

column2: yme, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I was previously prescribed Imitrex which wasn't very consistent.  Sometimes I would take my maximum for the day and still no relief whatsoever.I've been taking Zomig for about three years.  It's 99% effective in relieving my migraine pain.  And like most of the other people who've posted reviews, I make sure I carry at least one at all times.  To make life easier I make sure I have some when I go on vacation and at work.  I suffer slightly from side affects but the positive strongly outweigh the negative.

column2: EnaCatori, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I recommend this medication to anyone I know who suffers from migraines.  My body adapts to medications quickly, so I had tried Imitrex and Maxalt among other meds, but they all stopped working after a few treatments.  The Zomig ZMT has been working wonderfully for me for a few years now and the side effects are a lot better than the pain of the migraine.  I make sure to keep one in my purse, my desk and in my travel bag...just to make sure if I need it...it's right there.

column2: Jonesy, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I keep Zomig in my home, car, purse, golf bag and at work.  My migraines are at least 3-5 days in a row during my cycle and occasionally with weather changes or severe allergies.  I started using this drug about 4 years ago and at first I had some light chest pains, severe skin sensitivity (cold, hot or tingling). After using it for some time, I do not have any of those symptoms now and it no longer makes me sleepy to take it.  I am an RN and I can take this drug when I feel it coming on and continue to work and my migraine will be gone in 30 minutes.  Many of my friends and co-workers have started taking Zomig because they observed how well it worked for me.

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I must have had an allergic reaction to this medication because not only did I fall into severe depression but I was numb from my head to my waist and then when it wore off my whole body was very sore! I will never take it again.

column2: Mary, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I have used this drug for years.  I break my pills in quarters and take only a quarter Zomig and I Advil tablet. Covering my eyes helps too.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I've had good results with this medicine.  I like the ease of use, and it does a decent job of getting rid of my headache.  My only problem with it is that I definitely have had some of the side effects.  It's actually made my nausea worse, and I've had numbness and tingling from my jaw, down to my neck, chest and shoulders.  I'm actually going to request to be put back on Maxalt because of the side effects.

column2: hawkeyeb, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: This is a wonder drug. My pain is gone in 30 to 45 minutes.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: This is my wonder pill.  Migraines used to keep me from my daily activities, but this pill eliminates the pain and I can still function normally.  The only side effects I have noticed are slight drowsiness, a tight feeling in my throat, and skin sensitivity.  I highly recommend this medication!  I like it much better than the nasal spray which dripped down my throat and tasted bad, and also made my nasal cavity sensitive.
